Course Name: ACG 4200 - ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS I
Course Title: ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS I
Course Description: THIS IS THE FIRST OF TWO ADVANCED FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS COURSES. IT FOCUSES ON ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS RELATED TO BUSINESS CONSOLIDATIONS, MERGERS AND ACQUISITIONS, AND OTHER BUSINESS COMBINATIONS. TOPICS INCLUDE STOCK INVESTMENTS, CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND INTER-COMPANY TRANSACTIONS. THIS COURSE MUST BE COMPLETED AT HODGES UNIVERSITY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
